td.div:
Dear ${object.title_id.name or ''}. ${object.partner_name or ''},
Thank you for your application to the ${object.job_id.name | safe} role at ${object.company_id.name}
We would like to invite you to interview for the role on ${format_datetime(object.interview_date, tz=object.company_id.tz)} at ${object.interviewer_place}.
Please reply to this email directly with your availability
We look forward to speaking with you.
Sincerely,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;
padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.title_id.name or ''}. ${object.partner_name or ''},
Congratulations on your offer from ${object.company_id.name}! We are delighted to offer you the position of ${object.job_id.name} with an anticipated start date of ${object.desired_start_date}.
As discussed, [over the phone, during your interview, etc.], please find attached your detailed offer letter. If you choose to accept this offer, please sign, scan, and email your letter to me at ${object.user_id.email or ''} by [decision deadline].
In the meantime, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me, either through email or by calling me directly at ${object.user_id.phone or ''} if you should have any questions or concerns.
We are looking forward to hearing from you and hope you’ll join our team!
Sincerely,

table.style: min-width: 590px; background-color: white; font-size: 11px; padding: 0px 8px 0px 8px; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear management team,
Here is a reminder that the probationary period for ${object.title} ${object.employee_id.name} will end at ${object.trial_date_end.strftime('%d-%b-%Y')}.
To see the detail of the contract, please click to following button
View Contract

td.div:
Dear ${object.title_id.name or ''}. ${object.partner_name or ''},
Thank you so much for taking time to interview with us for the role of ${object.job_id.name}. We really appreciate your interest in working for Academy of Culinary Arts Cambodia.
I am writing to let you know that unfortunately on this occasion your application was not successful. The selected candidate more closely matched the job requirements of the position.
We do appreciate you taking the time to meet with us and encourage you to apply for other openings at our organization in the future.
Sincerely,
